body:
Comment 9 by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
Even though tip.golang.org can work around stale directory listings, there is still an
issue for people using godoc to browse code besides the go project itself. Also, not
everyone will be able to restart the server. I'm sure some godoc servers will be guarded
by systems managers... :)

If it's not feasible to regenerate the listings, a stopgap measure would be to turn the
timestamps flag on by default. Then the behavior will at least be transparent.
